Hotel.name: The Westin New York Grand Central

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Westin New York Grand Central, you'll be centrally located in New York, minutes from Chrysler Building and Grand Central Terminal. This 4-star hotel is close to Empire State Building and Rockefeller Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 774 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Digital programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge) and concierge services. This hotel also features babysitting/childcare (surcharge) and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3:00 PM Check-out time is 12:00 PM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at The Westin New York Grand Central, you'll be centrally located in New York, minutes from Chrysler Building and Grand Central Terminal. This 4-star hotel is close to Empire State Building and Rockefeller Center.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Chrysler Building - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Grand Central Terminal - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
United Nations Headquarters - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
The Morgan Library and Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
New York Public Library - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Bryant Park - 1 km / 0.6 mi
St. Patrick's Cathedral - 1 km / 0.6 mi
NBC Studios - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Empire State Building - 1 km / 0.6 mi
International Center of Photography - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Rockefeller Center - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Top of the Rock Observation Deck - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Museum of Television and Radio - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Herald Square - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Macy's - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
New York, NY (JRB-Downtown Manhattan Heliport) - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 9 km / 5.6 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 18.4 km / 11.4 mi
New York, NY (JFK-John F. Kennedy Intl.) - 20 km / 12.4 mi

The preferred airport for The Westin New York Grand Central is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Please note: For Dynamic bookings only: Please note that if the rate is inclusive of breakfast, this will only be provided for a maximum number of 2 guests regardless of how many guests are confirmed for the room. Additional guests will have to pay for the breakfast charge directly to the hotel. Please be advised that if booking for 3 or more guests, there is an extra person fee not included in the rate and this is to be paid directly to the hotel on arrival.Destination Amenity Fee should be paid directly at the hotel. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Room 1:

DELUXE ROOM WITH TWO BEDS. NO ROLLAWAY BEDS ALLOWED. EARLY DEPARTURE FEE - 1 NIGHT ROOM AND TAX.

Room 1:

TRADITIONAL ROOM WITH TWO FULL BEDS. NO ROLLAWAY BEDS ALLOWED. EARLY DEPARTURE FEE - 1 NIGHT ROOM AND TAX.

Room 1

Notice
Check-in time is 4:00pm check-out time is Noon. All guests arriving before 3:00pm will be accommodated as rooms become available.


•Parking: Hotel offers valet parking per day (plus applicable taxes) (subject to change); •Porterage: Hotel will provide Porterage service for a fee (plus applicable taxes) (subject to change); •Incidental Charges: Settled directly by the guest prior to departure

Child policy
Persons under the age of twenty-one (21) are not permitted to stay.They have to stay with another person over the the age of twenty-one (21).

From 2016-09-14 To 2030-12-31
Stay Conditions
There is a restriction on stays longer than 28 day in New York City. Clients will not be able to make bookings for any longer than this.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
